name: Millennium Gel Pillow Large
descr:
Millennium Pillow Gel

For decades, medical doctors, chiropractors and physio-therapists have searched for causes of stress on the spine and how to prevent it. In cooperation with Danish specialists doctors, Chiroform has developed and designed precisely the aids required both to prevent problems and to ease them if the damage has been done.

The Chiroform pillows is constructed and developed by Danish specialists doctors. Clinical study and test have been made to obtain medical grade in CE mark. Developed by the use of more than 100 x-rays pictures to secure size fitting.

The Chiroform Millennium Pillow is made from viscoelastic memory foam coated with a gel pad and from a precise moulding, which provide a unique density in the material and a warranty of 5 years.

Delivered with a soft and comfortable velour cover. Stitched inner cover.
